Asad Ali 
 
MSc.  (Asset Maintenance Manag ement), B.E. (Mechanical), API 571, 579  & 580 
 
Mobile: +971 50  36801 90, Email: eng.asadali@gmail.com 
 
Nationality: Pakistani, Age: 36 Years, Total Experience: 13 Years 
 
Key Skills: Asset Integrity & Reliability Management 
 
PROFILE SUMM ARY 
 
   Specialist in implementing asset integrity and reliability systems & risk based inspection programs. 
   Well versed with ADN OC asset integrity management systems with focus on RBI/AIM S compliance. 
   Experience in asset integrity management systems such as GALIOM , MERIDIUM, RELIASOFT  & VAIL-Plant. 
   Proficient in using ASME and API codes for static equipment and piping integrity management. 
 
   Skilled in team management through focus on KPIs, expert in conducting & presenting research & delivering knowledge. 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
ADNOC LNG                                                                                                                                                    DAS  Island, UAE 
Senior  Engineer  RBI                                                                                                                                      Nov 2018 – Till Date 
RBI Engineer                                                                                                                                                 Sep 2015 – Oct 2018  
Key re sponsibilities & accomplishments: 
 
►Initiated & leading the project "digitalizati on of asset integrity management system" to make paperless environment. 
 
►Gap  assessment of ADNOC LNG existing AIMS/RBI system with respect to new ADNOC & API guidelines. 
 
►Established criteria for new AIMS/RBI system & did thorough evaluations of available software in the market. 
 
►M ade roadmap for AI division 5 year plans and estimated budgets & resources for going fully digital. 
 
►Implementation of RBI based on ADNOC LNG SOP, API 580/581 and DNV-GL methodo logies. 
►As SME  for RBI, leading all the ongoing RBI studies, reviewing documents and responding to queries for setting up RBI at 
project phase for new constructions such as IGD E1 & IGD E2. Written several SOPs for AI departm ent related to AIM /RBI. 
►De velopment of corrosion loops using API 571/581/ADNOC LNG guidelines. 
►Administrator of DNV -GL GALIOM RBI software, user of VELOSI Inspection Data Management System. 
►Participated in HSECES  identification & performance standards implementation. 
►Conducted several class room & virtual training sessions for RBI methodology/software. Published two papers on RBI 
implementation, did presentation as technica l speaker in  ADIPEC  2019.  
 
 
Société Générale de Surveillance (SGS)                                                                                                         Karachi, Pakistan 
Assistant Manager - Asset Integrity Management (AIM) Division                                                         May 2015 – Aug 2015  
Key responsibilities and accomplishments:  
►Lead RBI projects, development of AIM system and software. 
 
►RBI trainings for SGS team and clients, presentations for AIM system and business development. 
 
 
TASN EE Petrochemical                                                                                                                                            Jubail, KSA 
Reliability (RBI) Engineer                                                                                                                          Nov 2014 – Feb 2015 
Key responsibilities and accomplishments:  
►Lead RBI team for risk assessment and inspection task generations based on API 580/581 using MERIDIUM software. 
 
 
Reliasoft Corporation                                                                                                                                         Warsaw, Poland 
Reliability  & Asset Integrity Engineer                                                                                                      Oct 2013 – July 2014 
Key responsibilities and accomplishments:  
►Technical support & training to customers for asset integrity management using RCM/FMEA, RAM and RBI.
